introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to the Fisheries Management System. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring your personal data is handled responsibly.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We collect personal information such as your name, email, national ID, phone number, and role to provide our services. This data is collected during registration and profile updates.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.text: Your data is used to manage your account, verify catches, and facilitate marketplace transactions. We may also use anonymized data to improve our services.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.text: We do not share your personal data with third parties except as required by law or to fulfill our services (e.g., blockchain verification with Pinata).

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at support@fisheries-system.com.
